texts.text: I raise myself up as I open my eyes.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Kaito... Good morning.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Morning.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Did you sleep well?
My silence is met with a confused tilt of her head.
I see Izumo and Wooleep come into the room, but I raise my hand at Izumo to keep her from speaking up.
Izumo said that Yonagi would regress, but to me, it looks like she's displaying more emotion than before.
I must be imagining things.
I decide to try something we've done before to see how she reacts.
If she really is regressing, then...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: ...Yonagi.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Yes?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Do you wanna play?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Yeah!

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What do you wanna do?
After finishing our meal and going back to the room, Yonagi falls asleep.
The contents of the dream seem to align with what she wanted us to play.
It'll probably be the same with the last one too.
According to Izumo, the next big change will come...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: When we finish the three dreams, huh?
Soon, we'll arrive at the end she spoke of.
And the most efficient way to get there remains the same:
Keep sleeping.
I lay down on the bed and close my eyes again.
